attributes.action: bring in a law to force mothers to abide by Family Court Orders which are in place allowing suitable contact for absent fathers who have joint parental responsibilty for their children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My reasons for requesting the Law regarding suitable contact is that my son has spent thousands of pounds taking out Court Orders to allow him regular contact with his children, but his ex-wife ignores them and there is little he can do without further legal costs, as she lives in Scotland whilst my son lives in England.
